job description:
Role: Business Analyst - Data

Experience: 4+ Years of experience
Location: Phoenix, AZ
Contract Duration: 4 months

Key responsibilities
  • Support day to day activities maintaining, building and thinking creatively about data for Digital Workplace colleagues. Our product teams are focused heavily on driving forward a set of metrics that will provide unique value to each team.
  • Play a key role in supporting the team with product team metric engagements and ensuring we can successfully meet the needs of our customers.
  • Help build, maintain and drive a social intranet community page to interact with our customers and provide a single place to learn and ask about data.
Skills:
  • 1. SQL proficient on Windows platform
  • 2. Splunk user experience
  • 3. Requirements building of Headline metric
  • 4. knowledgeable on Product metric engagements
  • 5. Support day to day activities maintaining, building and thinking creatively about data
  • "An Equal Opportunity Employer -- EEO/AA Employer/Vet/Disabled"
